1.title: Here to help.
1.subtitle: This is quick Q&A to inform us about what you are looking to achieve.

note.copy: You will be recommended solutions based on your answers, and encouraged to contact Old Pro when appropiate.

1.text: Do you need help with your computer, or enhancing general computer and computing literacy?

2.text: Are you researching or troubleshooting a technical solution for a project?

3.text: Do you need career guidance or mentorship in Web Development?

4.text: Do you need a website built from scratch?

yes.stop: A website is can be a big, beautiful, organic entity - or a static business card to suit your needs. Let's talk about your present needs and pain points, digging deep into what is guiding your project. Email us!

2.title: Let's take it slow
2.subtitle: It's hard to tell sometimes if a computer if friend or foe. There is A LOT to consider. Ask Old Pro any question, whether it seems basic. We build on foundations.

1.text: Is your learning directed by your career?

2.text: Does your employer have a training budget?

3.text: Do you need assistance at your office?

yes.stop: Email us with your in-office needs and we will respond asap.

4.text: Do you need assistance at your home?

no.stop: Email us with your in-home needs and we will respond asap.

5.text: Can we work over Skype instead?

yes.stop: Email us with your request, including your Skype address, and we will respond asap.

3.title: Let's build together
3.subtitle: Whether you are an entrepreneur needing to learn WordPress or optimize your search ranking, or a designer looking for code support.

3.text: Do you have time to work on this project?

no.stop: Your answers indicate that we are not suited to work together.

4.title: Think On These Things
4.subtitle: If you are junior or intermediate coder looking to upgrade your skills with a tutor, or looking for tips on how to get job ready - have a convesration with Old Pro first.

yes.stop: Email us to talk about your web career.

2.text: Do you have time to spend learning?

yes.stop: Email us to talk about your web career.

no.stop: Your answers indicate that we are not suited to work together.
